Dear bird resting in my hand I so admire your golden plumage, Such dramatic attire; documentaries claim Itâ€™s part of your mating game, except out here in the Swampy reeds along this churning river, where fishermen Sometimes wade There are few females to impress. I wonder if you gild your feathers just for Aesthetic pleasure?
